LanguageData.LingTA01haxz.degreeDatas.0.label: <color=#33ff00>Watchman</color>
LanguageData.LingTA01haxz.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] prefers to be up during the night. [PAWN_pronoun] gets a mood bonus if awake at night (23h-6h). [PAWN_pronoun] doesn't mind living in darkness.
LanguageData.LingTA02jzlc.degreeDatas.0.label: <color=#33ff00>Invaluable</color>
LanguageData.LingTA02jzlc.degreeDatas.0.description: For some unkown reason, [PAWN_nameDef] has become a hot commodity and very expensive.
LanguageData.LingTB01lth.degreeDatas.0.label: <color=#66ccff>Lose quality</color>
LanguageData.LingTB01lth.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] lost [PAWN_possessive] weight in an accident. [PAWN_pronoun] hardly needs food, but [PAWN_pronoun] still will get hurt or sick.
LanguageData.LingTZ01dmyz.degreeDatas.0.label: <color=#CDCDCD>Low Immunity</color>
LanguageData.LingTZ01dmyz.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has congenital immunodeficiency. So it's difficult for [PAWN_objective] to fight with diseases.
